pkgmetadata.longdescription: *sklearndf* is an open source library designed to address a common need with`scikit-learn <https://github.com/scikit-learn/scikit-learn>`__: the outputs oftransformers are numpy arrays, even when the input is adata frame. However, to inspect a model it is essential to keep track of thefeature names.To this end, *sklearndf* enhances scikit-learn's estimators as follows:- **Preserve data frame structure**: Return data frames as results of transformations, preserving feature names as the column index.- **Feature name tracing**: Add additional estimator properties to enable tracing a feature name back to its original input feature; this is especially useful for transformers that create new features (e.g., one-hot encode), and for pipelines that include such transformers.- **Easy use**: Simply append DF at the end of your usual scikit-learn class names to get enhanced data frame support!..
